title: Create a Performance Improvement Plan (PIP)
description: A manager needs to place an employee on a PIP for failing to meet performance expectations.

tasks.description: Consult with the manager to document the specific performance issues and desired improvements.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP works with the manager to define clear, measurable goals for the PIP.

tasks.description: Draft the PIP document using the company's standard template.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP creates the formal PIP document.

tasks.description: Schedule a meeting with the manager and employee to deliver the PIP and have it signed.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP schedules and attends the meeting to ensure it's handled correctly.
